A few things you’ll find on Reddit… 

■ Thousands of communities
Whether you're into breaking news, sports, TV fan theories, or a never-ending stream of the internet's cutest animals, there's a community on Reddit for you.
■ Laughs, lols, and plenty of ridiculousness 
Lose track of vast amounts of time as you find memes, bananas for scale, bread stapled to trees, cat videos, and more of the absurd and oddly absorbing. 
■ The best discussions 
The real action is always in the comments. Reddit’s discussion threads are where community members jump in to provide commentary, humor, and insight. 
■ Answers to questions you’re too afraid to ask in public 
Recipes, street fashion, career help, fitness plans, and more—find ideas and inspiration for whatever you want to do.
■ Live video streams, chats, and talks
Want to know what people are doing right now? Streaming videos, live chats, and live audio conversations give you a variety of ways to connect with people in the moment. 
■ Crowd-sourced points of view on just about everything
Product reviewers, music critics, sports fans, or doge enthusiasts—find people that obsess and care about whatever it is you’re interested in.
■ Anonymous profiles so you can do you
On Reddit, you (not your job, number of friends, or social status) define who you are. 
■ Lots and lots of cats

Встановіть застосунок Повітряна тривога, щоб миттєво отримувати сповіщення про повітряну тривогу у вибраному місті чи області України від системи цивільної оборони. 

За правильних налаштувань, застосунок буде голосно сповіщати про тривогу навіть у беззвучному режимі смартфона. Застосунок не потребує реєстрації, не збирає персональні дані або дані про геолокацію.

У застосунку доступні всі області України, а також додано можливість отримувати тривоги лише за обраним районом чи територіальною громадою.

Як працює застосунок: 

1. Оператор обласної державної адміністрації отримує сигнал про повітряну тривогу.
2. Оператор негайно передає інформацію на пульт.
3. Застосунок надсилає тривожне сповіщення користувачам, які обрали відповідну область.
4. Щойно оператор надсилає сигнал про відбій тривоги, користувачі застосунку отримують відповідне сповіщення.

Це єдиний застосунок, що підтримує критичні сповіщення. Це означає, що звук тривоги буде завжди надходити з максимальним рівнем гучності смартфону. Для цього надайте усі відповідні дозволи застосунку після встановлення. Важливо! Критичні сповіщення можна вимкнути в будь-який момент в налаштуваннях застосунку.

Бережіть себе та рідних.

Padre Pio TV is a television network with national and international diffusion, founded by the Capuchin Friars Minor to spread the Gospel through the teachings and the example of life of one of the most known and invoked Saints in the world.

Each day it broadcasts live from the Shrine of San Giovanni Rotondo three Mass Celebrations and two rosaries. In the scheduled programming there are also lauds, vespers, and complines; the Angelus, the Papal Audiences and the most significant pastoral activities of Pope Francis; analysis of problems, social and current events. In an extraordinary way and with great commitment the TV channel has made it possible for its viewers to follow in live streaming all the great events linked to the Saint it bears the name of. Padre Pio TV has been broadcasting its signal throughout Italy on LCN 145 since 22 September 2011, after inheriting the experience of the local TV channel Tele Radio Padre Pio, founded in 2001 and still active in the Puglia Area. 

Currently Padre Pio TV broadcasts its programmes also on Eutelsat in all of Europe and the Mediterranean; it is visible on Tivùsat (channel 445) and Sky (channel 852) and has a worldwide diffusion thanks to the video streaming on www.teleradiopadrepio.it .

The language of the programmes is Italian.

PODCAST PLAYER YOU NEED IN 2022

If you are podcast fans like we are, you know how a good podcast can transform the way you think or bring joy to you. However, it’s often very difficult to find the content you want among millions of episodes. With Noorami, we are solving the problem of podcast discovery by building a podcast search and recommendation engine into the app.

Noorami uses an AI-powered search engine that analyzes millions of podcast audio files to find the content and topics that are discussed in each episode. So now you can actually find content based on what is said in the conversations, even if what you are looking for is hidden deep into the episode. 

FIND CONTENT WITHIN EPISODES
With Noorami, we find the most relevant segments of an episode for you. Simply search whatever sentence is on your mind and the results will contain both the relevant episodes and the segment of each episode that is most related to your search. You can get a feel for the episode by listening to the segment, or listen to back to back segments so that you get different perspectives on what you care about.

SEARCH WITH MEANING, NOT KEYWORDS
You can now search full sentences and we will return results based on the meaning of your sentence. So you no longer have to worry about having the right keywords, simply state what is on your mind or a question you have and our search engine will do the rest for you. For example, you can say “How can I have more productive mornings?” or “What are some strategies for effective communication?”

RECOMMENDATIONS FOR YOUR TASTE
Noorami will recommend episodes based on your preferences and the topics that you have listened to. Our AI automatically generates topic sentences for you, so you know why the episodes are being recommended and what topics are discussed within them.

CHAT WITH LIKE-MINDED PODCAST FANS
You can now chat with other fans that listen to the same shows as you, or even talk directly to the podcast hosts. Different shows can have discussion rooms in the app, so you can easily find the group of people that share your interests. If a podcast show does not have a room, simply request a discussion room and a room will be created when there is enough interest in a show.

ALL THE IMPORTANT FEATURES OF A PODCAST PLAYER
For the best podcast listening experience, we know that it’s important to pay attention to details and have the essential features of a player. So we’ve made sure you can subscribe to your favorite shows among millions of podcasts, have an easy to use player and a playlist creator. We want Noorami to be easy to use and equipped with everything you need, so you can just enjoy the podcasts you love.

TELL US ABOUT YOUR FEATURE REQUESTS
If there is anything that you think will improve your experience, you can simply send us a chat. No emails or lengthy forms required, simply go to the chat screen, find the Noorami discussion room and talk to us directly!! Our team is always there to help you and listen to your requests, so don’t be shy!
